User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111122 Firefox/11.0a1
Build ID: 20111122030949

Steps to reproduce:

I'm currently running 20 + 3 App Tabs in 6 Tab Groups


Actual results:

I lose Tab Preview And get a big log ugly list of "Nightly Squares" (the pitiful empty unloaded boxes with the word Nightly beside)


Expected results:

See the Picture
With Save Session, Option to open to Panorama

Tab Preview should only show the Current Tab Group and App Tabs + Panorama
